Degree.definition: a step in a direct line of descent or in the line of ascent to a common ancestor 2 a

1.definition: a step in a direct line of descent or in the line of ascent to a common ancestor

2 a.definition: a measure of the seriousness of a crime see also,,,,

sub_terms.b: a measure of carea measure of negligence esp. in connection with bailments see also,

2 a.note: Crimes are rated by degrees for the purpose of imposing more severe punishments for more serious crimes.
